page.title: 01LOW HESKET _ LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There have been many road accidents as a result of the fast flowing and often busy A6. The accidents include a man being killed just south of Low Hesket as a result of a car going underneath a lorry. Up on the fell, just before Low Hesket, a motorbike collided with a car. He was killed. Any burgalries which have taken place have been of a high class nature. This is because alot of the people have retired to Low Hesket and have many valuables. The Police House has been there for 40 years. An actual Policeman has been there since the turn of the century. Today's Policeman has been there for 4 years. The pub and the shop are the only buildings which have an alarm. There is often trouble at the pub and the trouble makers are taken to Carlisle.
